analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x47e3037d6f019abd07b34428cefcdaa71cec5575.sol:
	Contract ContractSardis has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x47e3037d6f019abd07b34428cefcdaa71cec5575.sol#209-211)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x47e3037d6f019abd07b34428cefcdaa71cec5575.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
